column3: @luke-jr What about doing the same like 89d113e02a83617b4e971c160d47551476dacc71?\n
I think replacebyfee gives a better description of what this is.\n

@sandakersmann The idea is that future or derivative versions may support more replacement logic than merely by fee. The original replacement feature was planned to simply go based on sequence number, but that had DoS risks - RBF solves that, but it's not impossible someone may come up with an alternative solution. Anyway, please use #7431 for comments on the change itself - this PR is merely a ba
@sdaftuar Note that "false" and "true" are invalid for boolean options!\n
